trans-unit.source: A collection of simulated energy profiles, based on 12 different building shapes.
trans-unit.target: A collection of simulated energy profiles, based on 12 different building shapes.

trans-unit.source: The buildings differ with respect to differentiated by 8 features, such as glazing area, the glazing area distribution, and orientation.
trans-unit.target: The buildings differ with respect to differentiated by 8 features, such as glazing area, the glazing area distribution, and orientation.

trans-unit.source: Usage: Use either regression or classification to predict the energy efficiency rating based as one of two real valued responses.
trans-unit.target: Usage: Use either regression or classification to predict the energy efficiency rating based as one of two real valued responses.

trans-unit.source: For multi-class classification, is round the response variable to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: For multi-class classification, is round the response variable to the nearest integer.

trans-unit.source: Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science
trans-unit.target: Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science
